text: To date, four different approaches are establised for radical trachelectomy.Most data with longest follow-up exist for radical vaginal trachelectomy, less for abdominal radical trachelectomy, few for total laparoscopic radical trachelectomy and only small series for robotic-assisted radical trachelectomy.
